p: A Swetalert2 and Bootbox.js alternative build on Bootstrap 4 Modal and Toast components.
swalstrap_all.js will load automatically Swalstrap style sheet and will create a default instance of Swalstrap named Swal (and also aliased as swal, Sweetalert and sweetalert).
You can use Swalstrap applying fire method to the created instance:
If you prefer you can load Swalstrap stylesheet (or a customized one) separately:
In this case you must create at least an instance of Swalstrap an then use it to open your popups:

pre.code:
<script>
    // Create an instance 
    const mySwal = new Swalstrap();
    // Then use it for all your popups
    mySwal.fire('Wanderful!','Swalstrap is working!','success');
</script>

p: Alternatively you can install package via npm:

blockquote.p: Swalstrap is inspired to Sweetalert NOT a clone. Features are reproduced not copied. So there are differences. Please, watch documentation and test examples.
